game.name: Pingu & Friends
game.description:
Pingu & Friends is one of the most popular arcade games for boys and girls in which your favorite character Pingu has left the home along with his friends for an amazing stacking adventure. Jump from one block to another and aim to reach the highest platform possible for a high score in this cool online puzzle game.

Collect as many golden eggs as you can and unlock new characters and more vibrant background to make your gameplay more engaging than before.

Key Features:

  • Engaging Character Transformations: Keep an eye on the golden eggs that will be able to grab in the upward direction. These eggs will help add an extra layer of fun element to your gameplay and promote the exploration of multiple themes.
  • Accessible Tap Controls: Apart from the colourful graphics, this cool cloud game also features simple yet intuitive game controls, which allow players of all ages to try their hands while looking for great dose of fun and entertainment.
  • Challenging Balance Dynamics: When you move throughout the game, there are possibilities of meeting with some difficult challenges. So be prepared to challenge your skill and reflexes and work your way to reach the highest platform.

If you find Pingu and his friends pretty interesting, feel free to check out our other extensive range of free arcade games in a quest of extra entertainment. In this HTML5 jumper challenge, you have to time your jumps precisely so that your character can land safely on the continuously coming platforms. Get your score on the top of the screen and aim to climb higher and set your new high score today!
